verses.roman:
rāma-dāsa, gadādhara ādi kata jane
tomāra sahāya lāgi' dilu tomāra sane

synonyms: rāma-dāsa—Rāmadāsa; gadādhara—Gadādhara dāsa; ādi—and others; kata jane—some people; tomāra—Your; sahāya—assistants; lāgi'-as; dilu—I give; tomāra sane—with You.
translation: Nityānanda Prabhu was given assistants like Rāmadāsa, Gadādhara dāsa and several others. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "I give them to You to assist You.
